dialog: Thank you. I would also like to inform you that Chizuko will leave with you on your day of departure, and enroll in Yume Academy.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: While we will never cease worrying for her, your actions yesterday have proven your trustworthiness. Combined with the fact that both Mami and Ms. Mizue vouched for you, I believe that you will take good care of her.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: I brought this up in my discussion with President KongMing last night, and all the arrangements have been made.
That's unexpected. Do you mind me asking why?

name: Kugatsu
dialog: Our training here at Tsuruga Grand Shrine only involves fighting against Monsters, but not Chaos Creatures, which is a field that Yume Academy specializes in.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: Currently, Chizuko is next in line for the position of Head Priestess. However, she will need more training before she can be qualified to succeed Ms. Mizue as leader of the Shrine.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: President KongMing has also confirmed that she meets all the requirements to enroll in Yume Academy and that there is space for her on campus.
Don't worry! We're all very friendly and welcoming at the Academy. I reassure you that she will be in good hands.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: In exchange, Tsuruga Grand Shrine will provide some aid for Yume Academy.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: Usually, we Shrine Maidens only keep a bare minimum of "Symbols of Approval" for our use, and return the rest to the Realm of Trials.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: Starting from now, we will entrust the "Symbols of Approval" we acquired from the Realm of Trials to Yume Academy.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: We will also share some tips on the Trials. We hope that these would be of help to your confrontation against Chaos.
Thank you... This means a lot to us.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: You have helped us in our hour of need; now, we are merely returning the favor.

name: Kugatsu
dialog: That's all I have to say. If you have no more questions, I'd be taking my leave. There are still many issues from last night waiting to be resolved.
Good luck with that. Well, I suppose it's time for me to head back now.

name: Mami
dialog: Not so fast, *. Despite the commotion last night, the Ceremony tonight will be held as planned.

name: Mami
dialog: Chizuko asked me to inform you that she would like to be your guide in the Ceremony and to wait at the gates tonight.

title: A Happy Ending
name: Chizuko
dialog: Senpai! Uriel! I'm over here!
I thought I'm not your Senpai until you officially enroll in Yume Academy?

name: Chizuko
dialog: True, but I like calling you Senpai! It feels like we are closer this way.

name: Uriel
dialog: Chirpy as always, Chizuko.

name: Chizuko
dialog: It beats pulling a long face every day in my books. Let's go! There are so many stalls that you should visit!

name: Chizuko
dialog: You have to try Sakurako's Takoyaki! They're to die for!

name: Chizuko
dialog: Oooh, there's the Goldfish Scooping Stall of Kotoko! The goldfish there are very healthy and can live for a long time.

name: Chizuko
dialog: It's getting pretty busy now... This way, I know the best spot to watch the fireworks!
She sure looks like she's having fun.

name: Uriel
dialog: But she's a good guide. The takoyaki is exquisite!
Huh, these masks look familiar...

name: Chizuko
dialog: Oh, those are masks of Ao Oni and Aka Oni based on their descriptions in the legends.

name: Chizuko
dialog: I think they're changing the designs next year since we've seen what they look like now.

name: Uriel
dialog: To be honest, I thought such designs would scare you after what they did, but you're surprisingly okay with them.

name: Chizuko
dialog: A Head Priestess in the past once said that we should face our fears instead of hiding from them.

name: Chizuko
dialog: It went something along the lines of "If poor imitations could paralyze you with fear, then what will you do when you face the real deal?"

name: Uriel
dialog: She has a point.

name: Chizuko
dialog: This reminded me. You joined our lessons halfway through, so you missed the beginning!

name: Uriel
dialog: The beginning? Is Enbi no Mikoto involved anyhow?

name: Chizuko
dialog: You've become quite the Enbi no Mikoto fan too! Sadly, that would be a no. It's actually about Ao Oni and Aka Oni.

name: Chizuko
dialog: Ao Oni and Aka Oni were born in the faraway village of Tsuyuoka. They had no father, and their mother was an ordinary human being.

name: Chizuko
dialog: One night, the skies were painted an ominous shade and Monsters roamed the land. Their mother found herself pregnant and gave birth to the Brothers after ten days.

name: Chizuko
dialog: She was horrified when she saw her babies' deformed faces and the horns that grew from their foreheads, signs of them being of demonic nature.

name: Chizuko
dialog: However, she couldn't bring herself to kill them and decided to raise them secretly.

name: Uriel
dialog: ...They were children. Even if they committed unspeakable crimes in their adulthood, they were innocent as kids.

name: Uriel
dialog: I probably would have made the same choice as the mother if I was in her shoes.

name: Chizuko
dialog: When their mother discovered their powers, she laid down rules that regulated the use of their powers, hoping for them to have a normal childhood.

name: Chizuko
dialog: Despite her efforts, Tsuyuoka still suffered from frequent droughts since the birth of the Brothers, because Aka Oni often snickered when its mother's back is turned.

name: Chizuko
dialog: The villagers soon discovered the culprit of the droughts. Their mother tried to flee the village with them but was captured by the enraged villagers.

name: Chizuko
dialog: The people of Tsuyuoka beat the mother to death with rocks, and attempted to burn them alive in order to "cleanse their sins", a method that they learned from the legends.

name: Chizuko
dialog: Ao Oni sobbed uncontrollably upon witnessing its mother's death, and its cries called upon thick rain clouds. Soon, Tsuyuoka was submerged by a flood brought by the heavy rain.

name: Chizuko
dialog: The Brothers realized that the murderers of their mother were no match for them at all, and took their revenge by taking over Tsuyuoka.

name: Chizuko
dialog: They demanded offerings of treasure from the people of Tsuyuoka, and a young girl to be sacrificed to them on the day of their mother's death.

name: Chizuko
dialog: They will then beat the sacrifice to death with a stone and burn her alive. How horrible!
That's what the people of Tsuyuoka did to them, isn't it?

name: Uriel
dialog: I don't think it's right to torture an innocent like that, even if their revenge is justified.

name: Chizuko
dialog: That's why they're Monsters. Enbi no Mikoto was treated unjustly too, but she has always resPonded with kindness instead of hatred.

name: Uriel
dialog: That's why I admire her so much.

name: Chizuko
dialog: Senior Shrine Maidens also told us to learn from Enbi no Mikoto, and not from the Monsters.

name: Chizuko
dialog: And you know the rest: the people of Tsuyuoka prayed to their God, who defeated the Brothers.

name: Chizuko
dialog: The Brothers arrived here when they fled Tsuyuoka.

name: Chizuko
dialog: But they were still defeated by our God!

name: Uriel
dialog: It's a happy ending.

name: Chizuko
dialog: Yep!
Boom! Boom! Boom! Three huge fireworks bloomed in the sky.

name: Uriel
dialog: Woah, they're larger than the others, and so much prettier.

name: Chizuko
dialog: Oooh, it's time for the Kagura Dance performance!

name: Chizuko
dialog: Let's go! If we don't secure a good spot now, all we're going to be able to see will be the heads of the audience!

title: Finding a New Teammate
dialog: To encourage its students to participate in the Trials of the Tsuruga Grand Shrine, Yume Academy is hosting its first "Tsuruga Cup" Contest.
To enter this contest, students need to team up with other students in their House, challenge the trials, acquire rewards from them, and hand in the rewards to the Academy.
The six Houses will be ranked based on the amount and value of rewards submitted by their students, and the House ranked at the top will receive a special present courtesy of the Student Union.
Yume Academy stirred as students geared up to participate in this challenge that requires both luck and competence.
However, a certain student seems to be having a hard time finding teammates…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Arrrgh!

name: Saint
dialog: What's going on, Bud Elf? Why aren't you participating in the trials like the others?

name: Saint
dialog: Without you, House Fairy is no match for House Human.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I wanted to, but Susan…

name: Susan
dialog: Elffie~ My dear Elffie~ Can you promise not to be angry at me? I have something important to tell you~

name: Bud Elf
dialog: What is it? Did you mess up the fertilizer mix again or forget to water the flowers yesterday?

name: Susan
dialog: I did none of that!! Put your flower down, Elffie!!

name: Susan
dialog: Well, my dear Elffie, here's the thing: your dear Susy has an emergency, and can't be your teammate for the Trials.

name: Susan
dialog: You might want to find someone else to be your teammate~ Don't worry, I'm sure that everyone will kill to join your team~

name: Bud Elf
dialog: … And that's why my previous teammate, Susan, is not here with me.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: As per the rules of the Academy, students must form teams of at least two to take on the Trials, but I can't find anyone to join my team!

name: Saint
dialog: What about other students in House Fairy? They can't all be teamed up already, right?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Well…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Mio, I need to ask you something…

name: Mio
dialog: Meow, it's Bud Elf! Mio did not pick Bud Elf's flowers today, no Mio didn't!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Wait, don't go yet…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Oh, hi Kassy. Do you want to challenge the Trials with me?

name: Kassy
dialog: I'm sorry, Bud Elf, but I've already joined someone else's team.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: It's alright, Kassy… What about you, Elloi?

name: Elloi
dialog: Youcan'tseemeyoucan'tseemeyoucan'tseeme…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: …Forget it.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: It's obvious that no one wants to join my team!

name: Saint
dialog: That's a pity. If I wasn't in House Human, I'd love to be your teammate.

name: Saint
dialog: However, as the former House President of House Human, it's my responsibility to lead House Human to victory.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Thank you, Saint.

name: Saint
dialog: I should go; my teammates are calling for me. I wish you luck on your search for teammates. House Human will win fair and square, not because its rival is weakened.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: … Okay! I don't need any lousy teammates anyway, I can clear a trial all on my own!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: As long as no one catches me, I won't get in trouble for heading into the Realm of Trials alone!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I will make them regret not teaming up with me!
Please don't… It's too dangerous for you to go alone, Bud Elf…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Who are you?? Let go of my leg!

name: Holly
dialog: I… I… I am…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Can't you speak a whole sentence without stuttering? Wait a minute, I think I know you. You're one of the juniors of our House, aren't you?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I don't know you that well, so feel free to go tell on me to Senpai and the others, but please let go of my leg.

name: Holly
dialog: My name is… Holly… Whew, that was hard…

name: Holly
dialog: I am not a snitch, but… but I won't let go either.

name: Holly
dialog: You're not supposed to take on a Trial alone… The rules state that the trials can only be challenged by two or more students!

title: Bud Elf's Biggest Fan
name: Holly
dialog: I'm not letting go… It's too dangerous for you to go alone…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I don't have a choice! No one wants to team up with me, so the only way left is to go by myself.

name: Holly
dialog: I… I can try to persuade others to join your team…

name: Holly
dialog: People are convinced that you are a soft-hearted person, so they underestimate your strength…

name: Holly
dialog: When they finally open their eyes to how strong you are, everyone will want to take on the trials with you…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Soft-hearted?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Are you sure you're not talking about someone else?

name: Holly
dialog: I don't think so… It's impossible to mistake someone else for you!

name: Holly
dialog: You are extremely kind and patiently water me every day.

name: Holly
dialog: You are the one who carries me out from the Greenhouse to bask in the sun,

name: Holly
dialog: and the one who chases the birds away when they come pecking at me…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Wait, I don't remember doing any of this for a person. Who are you?

name: Holly
dialog: As I said, I am Holly… The climber plant on the trees of the Gardening Club…

name: Holly
dialog: I return to my plant form from time to time to rest, but I never hurt those trees, nor have I drained nutrients from them…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Senpai did tell me that one of the newbies was a sentient plant.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I thought he was talking nonsense, but it seems like I was wrong.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: So you are that Holly, hmm? That explains why it disappears sometimes. I thought it died because I didn't take good care of it.

name: Holly
dialog: But you did! You are always patient and kind to us, and all plants adore you!

name: Holly
dialog: I think that's why the other students don't believe that you can hold your own in the Trials…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Pfft.

name: Holly
dialog: … But they don't know about your incredible strength! No matter how heavy the flower pots are, you can carry them all by yourself.

name: Holly
dialog: Once I tell them about this, they will know that you can pull your weight in the Trials, and you won't have to worry about not having teammates anymore!

name: Holly
dialog: … Unlike me, who is no help at all because I'm just bad at PE.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Hahahahahahaha!!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I have to admit, you're a funny one. The real reason that no one wants to team up with me is not because of my "kindness".

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Haven't you heard the names the others have for me?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: One of the Seven Mysteries of the Academy, the nightmare of the Gardening Club, the local weirdo, the "Power Girl"…

name: Holly
dialog: Wh-What?!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: They do not shun me because I lack strength. On the contrary, they shun me because of my strength.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: No matter what they think, I will not change my principles: whoever hurts plants will be punished!

name: Holly
dialog: But… But… The rules of Senpai and the Student Union…

name: Holly
dialog: And you need someone to watch your back no matter how strong you are…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Ugh, we're just going around in circles. Wait, aren't you in House Fairy too?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Then it's settled: you can come with me to challenge the trials. I have someone to watch my back, and you don't have to worry about me breaking the rules.

name: Holly
dialog: M-Me? But I… I can't… Please let go of me…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You're the one that won't let go of my leg in the first place! Now stop whining and let's go!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Hahahaha, I'm finally in!

name: Holly
dialog: What should I do? I won't be of any help to Bud Elf in the Trials…

title: Holly's Three Strengths
name: Holly
dialog: I… I…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Yeah, yeah, I've heard all the stories.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Like the one about how you managed to run slower than other people who aren't even running, the one about it taking 5 minutes to complete a 400-meter course,

name: Bud Elf
dialog: the one about how nodding is your way of doing sit-ups, and the one about how you trip over yourself on flat ground.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I know all about those. Don't worry too much, it's just a Trial. I've got this.

name: Holly
dialog: … Can we please not talk about these embarrassing stories of mine?

name: Holly
dialog: … On second thought, no, let's talk about them.

name: Holly
dialog: Then you should know perfectly well that I'm nothing but dead weight when it comes to anything too strenuous. I'm sorry for any trouble I may cause…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I insisted, didn't I? I will take responsibility if anything bad happens. You don't have to beat yourself up too much on this.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Besides, there must be something that you're good at.

name: Holly
dialog: Uh… Um… Yes, but I don't think they will help…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Fine, change of tactics. List three things you're good at from the top of your head.

name: Holly
dialog: O-Okay?

name: Holly
dialog: Erm, one, I'm a plant, so I can communicate with other plants, ask them for help, and know how to take care of them.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: That's pretty useful.

name: Holly
dialog: But… the "plants" in the Realm of Trials are illusions, and they don't resPond to my words at all…

name: Holly
dialog: In a real forest, I can ask the forest to bless us, but here…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: One down, two to go. What else?

name: Holly
dialog: I… I can play the flute and sing. Senpai and other classmates said that my music is beautiful.

name: Holly
dialog: But I don't see how…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Go on, there's still one left!

name: Holly
dialog: Yes ma'am!

name: Holly
dialog: And… Uh… I know basic first aid…

name: Holly
dialog: … But Dr. Raphael and Vera are way better at this than me…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Well, those don't sound useless to me.

name: Holly
dialog: Really…?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You're a plant, and I like plants.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You know how to take care of plants, so we have a lot in common, and you don't annoy me as the others do.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I feel at ease in the presence of someone else who shares my interests.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: And look at the trial grounds: there are nothing but enemies here.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You can play the flute and sing, so I won't get bored to death.

name: Holly
dialog: If you would like to hear me play, then I'd be glad to oblige…

name: Holly
dialog: Does it really count as helping when all I do is keep you company?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: At least you alleviate my bad mood, which is more help than I can say for some people.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Such as Aquaris, who serves only to annoy me. I'd probably end up beating her than the enemies in the Trials if we're in the same team.

name: Holly
dialog: Um, should we be talking about Aquaris behind her back like this…?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I'm just making an example.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: What's more, you know first aid! I can confidently say that I know nothing about this. If I'm injured, then I have to wait until I clear this Trial before I can get my wounds looked at if you're not here.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You're being very helpful in my books. I'll handle the fighting, and you can handle everything else. Sounds good to you?

name: Holly
dialog: … Yes! Yes, I'll try my best!

name: Holly
dialog: Of course, I'll be glad if you don't get injured in the first place…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Relax, Holly. As I said, I'll handle the fighting.

name: Holly
dialog: But… If you are injured, I need to know where the injuries are at…

name: Holly
dialog: I have to memorize their location so I can take care of them after the battle…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I think I'll know where my wounds are. You know, since they hurt?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: The enemies are getting close. Hide somewhere safe, okay?

name: Holly
dialog: Okay. You won't have to worry about me!
Bud Elf waved her flower menacingly and rushed towards the first wave of enemies.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Take this!

name: Holly
dialog: Wow, Bud Elf is so strong~

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Who's talking? It sounds like… Holly?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: At least she doesn't seem to be in any danger. Better get rid of these enemies first.

name: Holly
dialog: That flower is huge, but Bud Elf makes it look effortless…

name: Holly
dialog: She's so cool!

name: Holly
dialog: I want to…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: … Why do I have a bad feeling about this?

name: Holly
dialog: ♪Amidst the tune of the forest I sing♪\n♪The song of a legend second to none♪

name: Holly
dialog: ♪Her strength unmatched♪\n♪Her courage unweakened♪

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Uh, is she singing? About me?

name: Holly
dialog: ♪Against darkness, she stands♪\n♪From perils, she finds chance♪

name: Bud Elf
dialog: This is so cringe-worthy…

name: Holly
dialog: ♪The wicked cower in fear♪\n♪As the pure blossom comes near♪

name: Bud Elf
dialog: One… Last… Enemy…

name: Holly
dialog: ♪Within...Hmmmmmph!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: That's it! No more singing for you!

name: Holly
dialog: Hmmmph… Why?? I thought you liked my singing voice. All I wanted to do was to cheer you on…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Try a normal song next time! I mean, what were you even singing back there? None of that is true!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: … You shouldn't even be singing about me in the first place!

name: Holly
dialog: What are you talking about? It's totally true! Sure, I might have embellished it a bit, but you're just that amazing!

name: Holly
dialog: Besides, I'm the only one here to witness your awe-inspiring battles! I'm going to sing them to everyone once we return to the Academy.

name: Holly
dialog: And they will finally realize that they're missing out!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Somehow I feel like this will backfire terribly…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: And please don't do that. Please.

name: Holly
dialog: Oh no, there's a wound on your hand! Please sit down, I'll take care of it now.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You don't have to worry too much, Holly, it's just a small cut.

name: Holly
dialog: Are you injured anywhere else? I have the gauze and disinfectant ready.

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Nah, that's the only one, and it's a small wound.

name: Holly
dialog: (Blows on the wound) Pain, pain, go away…

name: Holly
dialog: Alright, it's properly wrapped now!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Erm, was it really necessary to wrap my entire hand?

name: Holly
dialog: Absolutely! All wounds have to be treated carefully!

title: Some Things Never Change
name: Holly
dialog: So this is what happened in the Realm of Trials last time…

name: Susan
dialog: Hahaha, that's right! Effie is just that awesome!

name: Susan
dialog: You're also something yourself. Not everyone has what it takes to be Effie's friend.

name: Holly
dialog: I still can't believe I really became friends with the legendary Bud Elf…

name: Bud Elf
dialog: I don't mind the two of you chatting, but can you maybe move your conversation elsewhere? It's sort of uncomfortable when you're squished between two people…

name: Susan
dialog: Why should we? This is our way to show our affections~
Huh, now that's not something you see every day.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: It's Holly and Bud Elf! They look like they're getting along really well.

name: Mio
dialog: Meow! Are you sure that Holly is not forced to be Bud Elf's friend?

name: Aquaris
dialog: Doesn't look like it. Look at that huge grin on Holly's face!

name: Aquaris
dialog: Is Bud Elf more amiable now? If that's the case, I should go say hi!

name: Aquaris
dialog: (Runs over) Hello, Bud Elf~

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Aquaris? What are you-

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Hm?

name: Aquaris
dialog: Bud Elf! How did you get Holly to team up with you?

name: Aquaris
dialog: … Did I say something wrong? Why are you glaring at me?

name: Holly
dialog: Uh, Aquaris, you might want to look down.
Everyone looked at Aquaris, who shakily looked down.

name: Aquaris
dialog: (Steps back) ……

name: Susan
dialog: What a naughty flower! What is it doing outside of the flower bed?

name: Iron Fist
dialog: (Whispers) Aquaris, this is your cue to run.
(Whispers) Good luck, Aquaris.

name: Aquaris
dialog: I'm sorry!!!!!!

name: Bud Elf
dialog: You again! Trampling all over my beloved plant friends! I will hammer the lesson into your brick head this time!!

name: Holly
dialog: And off they go…

name: Susan
dialog: Haha, Elffie runs as fast as I remembered~

name: Holly
dialog: Are you sure everything is alright?

name: Susan
dialog: Of course! Aquaris is no match for Elffie, so there's nothing to worry about!
I think it's Aquaris we need to worry about, not Bud Elf.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: It seems like nothing changed with Bud Elf after all.

name: Mio
dialog: Meow… So is Bud Elf kinder to Holly because she is a plant?

name: Holly
dialog: Of course not! Bud Elf is always kind!

name: Mio
dialog: But… what about Aquaris?

name: Holly
dialog: That's because she stepped on the flower. As long as no plants are hurt…

name: Susan
dialog: I think Aquaris is secretly a genius at grating on Elffie's nerves. She never fails to make Elffie angry!

name: Holly
dialog: That's right! So it's not Bud Elf's fault that she's always angry with Aquaris!
By the way, I saw you and Bud Elf registered as a team in the Realm of Trials. Is that how you got to know each other?

name: Holly
dialog: Yes!
How was it? Did you manage to get a lot of Origami Cranes?

name: Holly
dialog: We did… Bud Elf was amazing…

name: Holly
dialog: The treasure we got from the Pond of Prayers was extremely valuable as well… at least that's what President KongMing said.

name: Iron Fist
dialog: Sounds like House Monster has to work harder to win this contest!

name: Holly
dialog: I wrote a song praising Bud Elf back in the Realm of Trials…

name: Holly
dialog: I'd like to share it with you…

name: Aquaris
dialog: Huff, huff, huff… I can't run anymore, please forgive me… Wait, is someone singing?

name: Bud Elf
dialog: Holly!! I told you not to sing it anymore!!!

title: Sivney's Research
name: Sivney
dialog: Have you finished organizing the data?

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps merrily)

name: Sivney
dialog: Good job, Bonnie!

name: Sivney
dialog: Now, if we put this together with the data that we finished organizing earlier…

name: Sivney
dialog: It appears that items granted by the Pond of Prayers may have a connection with the wish made by the person offering the Origami Cranes…

name: Sivney
dialog: The more focused the person making the wish is, the more prone the Pond of Prayers will be to fulfill their wish exactly according to their thoughts.

name: Sivney
dialog: Hmm… I see. This is how "the Gods respond to prayers made by the pure-hearted"…

name: Sivney
dialog: The Pond has a processor with psychic powers, but it lacks the ability to filter out distractors.

name: Sivney
dialog: Report 121 states that the subject wished for herbs and swords, but received a fanny pack instead.

name: Sivney
dialog: My theory is that it identifies the category the wish is associated with based on past patterns and keywords. Irrelevant thoughts only serve to disrupt the processor from arriving at the desired result.

name: Sivney
dialog: Hmm, and if I factor in the influences of pronunciation and language structure of the ancient Tsuruga dialect…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps disparagingly)

name: Sivney
dialog: Haha, I wouldn't be surprised if you manage to do better than that.

name: Sivney
dialog: It IS ancient in terms of technology, after all.

name: Sivney
dialog: But we're not here to optimize it, are we? Our job is to figure out how it works so the Academy can utilize it better.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps a suggestion)

name: Sivney
dialog: Of course, I did consider taking it apart and studying its structure.

name: Sivney
dialog: I probably would have, but as you can see…

name: Mami
dialog: (Glares)

name: Sivney
dialog: It might not be the best course of action when we have a guard watching us like a hawk.

name: Sivney
dialog: Now that I think about it, she seems to be oddly cautious of me despite the fact that we've never met before.

name: Sivney
dialog: Perhaps a certain Senpai told her about me? Hmm…

name: Sivney
dialog: Ah, I'm getting off course. Back to our research… From what we've gleaned by analyzing these data, we can conclude that we should have the more simple-minded students make wishes.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Raises her wing)

name: Sivney
dialog: Yes, certainly, you can have a try at this later too.

name: Sivney
dialog: Moving on to our next topic: the correlation between the number of Origami Cranes offered and the result of wishes.

name: Sivney
dialog: So far, we can observe that the results agree with our expectations: the more Origami Cranes offered, the more valuable the prize will be.

name: Sivney
dialog: If the wisher offers one Origami Crane only for a life-saving elixir, the Pond will grant a licorice leaf. However, if the number of Origami Cranes offered is increased, then rarer herbs or even medicine pills may be granted.

name: Sivney
dialog: It should also be noted that the items from the Pond are up-to-date with the time period the wish was made, despite them being far after the time the Pond was created.

name: Sivney
dialog: (Mumbles) How unfortunate. I would have loved to study the inner workings of the Pond of Prayers…

name: Mami
dialog: (Glares)

name: Sivney
dialog: Ahem. There have also been reports of the wisher offering more Origami Cranes but receiving a less desired result.

name: Sivney
dialog: What the Pond deems to be valuable seems to differ from the general crowd.

name: Sivney
dialog: Our next goal is to figure out the relationship between different types of wishes, the number of Origami Cranes offered and the quality of the rewards.

name: Sivney
dialog: Hmph, the data we have now is insufficient to deduce how to achieve the best results with the least cost.

name: Sivney
dialog: Come on, Bonnie, it's time for us to get our hands on some Origami Cranes for the sake of our research.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps questioningly)

name: Sivney
dialog: Going in teams? That rule is set to ensure the safety of students who dare to take on the trials, but I'm not a regular student, am I?

name: Sivney
dialog: Besides, that's why I have you, Bonnie. Let's go!

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Hops and chirps merrily)
As Bonnie skips towards the entrance of the Realm of Trials, an invisible force rams into her and knocks her to the ground.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps in pain)
Ow, ow, ow…

name: Sivney
dialog: Hm, I smell blood… The person or beast that knocked you over must be invisible.

name: Sivney
dialog: Wait, the space on top of Bonnie is being distorted… It's the effects of Optical Camouflage!

name: Sivney
dialog: Hello? Can you get up? You're crushing my Bonnie here.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps weakly)
So-Sorry…

name: Trinity
dialog: … Dr. Sivney?!

title: The Invisible Girl
name: Sivney
dialog: Try moving your left wing, Bonnie.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Waves her left wing)

name: Sivney
dialog: Does it hurt if I squeeze it lightly like this?

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Shakes her head)

name: Sivney
dialog: Great! Looks like the bone isn't broken.

name: Sivney
dialog: Phew, just when I was worried that I have to find myself a new research assistant…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps indignantly)

name: Sivney
dialog: I'm joking, Bonnie, no one is good enough to replace you. You're the best assistant I ever had.

name: Sivney
dialog: Well, well, well, let's see which bumbling fool almost murdered my best assistant…

name: Trinity
dialog: Mana depleting… Entering Sleep Mode… Zzzz…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Ultimate Penguin Kick!)

name: Trinity
dialog: I've been ambushed-

name: Trinity
dialog: Wait, that's not right. I should be out of the Realm of Trials by now.

name: Trinity
dialog: … Dr. Sivney?!

name: Sivney
dialog: I'm sorry, do I know you?

name: Trinity
dialog: Wh-what?!

name: Trinity
dialog: Don't you remember me, Dr. Sivney?!

name: Trinity
dialog: (Pouts)

name: Sivney
dialog: Aww, of course I remember you. I was just pulling your leg.

name: Sivney
dialog: I can still recall making that Battle Suit…

name: Trinity
dialog: Really? Then what's my name?

name: Sivney
dialog: Hmm… You must be Skye!

name: Sivney
dialog: Ha, look at that expression on your face! It's Trinity, right?

name: Trinity
dialog: So you knew all along…

name: Sivney
dialog: (Not until the Battle Suit jogged my memory.)

name: Sivney
dialog: Since you've just returned from the Trials, I'd like a detailed report on the situation inside the Realm of Trials.

name: Sivney
dialog: I can also use another person to help me gather data for my research on the Pond of Prayers. I'll tell you what to wish for later.

name: Trinity
dialog: Erm, regarding the Trials…

name: Trinity
dialog: Erm…

name: Sivney
dialog: What's the matter? Don't tell me that you've forgotten how to deliver a proper report despite having studied under me…

name: Trinity
dialog: N-No, I will never forget what you taught me!

name: Trinity
dialog: It's just… the data… Uh…
Trinity reluctantly recounted her experience in the Trials.

name: Sivney
dialog: So let me get this straight: you stopped at the third stage due to a bout of drowsiness.

name: Trinity
dialog: I couldn't keep my eyes open. I managed to clear the stage I was in, but it would have been risky to venture into the next stage.

name: Trinity
dialog: I didn't want you to know because it was so embarrassing…

name: Sivney
dialog: What happened to your teammates? This shouldn't have been a problem if they were there to watch your back and wake you if you fall asleep.

name: Trinity
dialog: None exist. They're always looking at me like I'm a freak! There's no way I'm teaming up with them!

name: Trinity
dialog: It's not a crime if you don't get caught, so I wouldn't be breaking school rules if no one caught me in the act.

name: Trinity
dialog: Hence the Optical Camouflage… Oops. Dr. Sivney, you won't tell on me, right?

name: Sivney
dialog: I have better things to do than being a tattle-tale… There, everything's recorded now. If there's nothing more to add, I'll be taking my leave.

name: Trinity
dialog: Uh, Dr. Sivney, what about the rules?

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps proudly)

name: Sivney
dialog: Well, I'm not heading in there myself, am I? I'm teamed up with Bonnie, who is perfectly capable of pulling her weight.

name: Trinity
dialog: Wait, you can do that?

name: Trinity
dialog: … Can, can I go with you?

name: Sivney
dialog: I have nothing against that, but shouldn't you get your wounds treated first?

name: Trinity
dialog: Nah, they're minor ones that don't hinder my performance. Don't worry!

title: Trinity's Battle Suit
name: Sivney
dialog: I'm in!

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps)

name: Trinity
dialog: I'm in too… Owww…

name: Trinity
dialog: No problems whatsoever...

name: Sivney
dialog: Said by someone who landed on their face.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps pityingly)

name: Trinity
dialog: Pl-please pretend that nothing happened…

name: Trinity
dialog: (Hisses in pain) Ugh, I think I reopened a wound…

name: Sivney
dialog: Are you alright? You can rest on the sidelines if you need to.

name: Trinity
dialog: (And waste my chance to impress Dr. Sivney? Never!)

name: Trinity
dialog: It's nothing! Nothing, I say!
(Fizzes)

name: Trinity
dialog: What's that sound?

name: Sivney
dialog: There's smoke coming from your rifle, Trinity.

name: Trinity
dialog: Soul Destruction took a hit from the monsters just now… Is it malfunctioning?

name: Trinity
dialog: I have to fix it…

name: Trinity
dialog: The Energy Storage Cell is sending a warning message… Yikes, it's burning hot!

name: Sivney
dialog: (Sighs) What now?

name: Trinity
dialog: Please give me some more time, I'll have it up and running again in no time!

name: Trinity
dialog: Just a few more minutes…

name: Sivney
dialog: Fine, because I'm so kind…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps disdainfully)

name: Trinity
dialog: This is fixed… This is also fixed… These parts need replacing…

name: Sivney
dialog: Hmm, you're pretty skilled at this. Have you been practising in your spare time?

name: Trinity
dialog: Yep! I've read through the notes you gifted me many times, and tried to make adjustments on the Battle Suit and Soul Destruction myself!

name: Sivney
dialog: (Notes? But those have to be at least half a century old…)

name: Trinity
dialog: On the topic of Battle Suits, there's something I've always wanted to ask…

name: Sivney
dialog: Ask away.

name: Trinity
dialog: There's nothing strange with the Battle Suit's design, right?

name: Trinity
dialog: I remember you telling me that this is normal in the outside world.

name: Sivney
dialog: I did.

name: Trinity
dialog: Phew… I told them that this style is common in outfits!

name: Sivney
dialog: Although…

name: Trinity
dialog: Although?

name: Sivney
dialog: I don't remember the Battle Suit being this tight-fitting when I designed it…

name: Sivney
dialog: Its material shouldn't shrink with wash…

name: Trinity
dialog: (Splutters)

name: Trinity
dialog: Is, is that so?

name: Trinity
dialog: If the Battle Suit hasn't shrunk…

name: Trinity
dialog: This means that… I've gained weight…

name: Trinity
dialog: I should probably... Go on a diet…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps meanly)

name: Sivney
dialog: Oookay, I might have went a bit overboard.

name: Sivney
dialog: I was just teasing you, Trinity.

name: Trinity
dialog: …Huh?

name: Sivney
dialog: The style of the Battle Suit is normal by my standards, but might be a bit too advanced for the general crowd.

name: Sivney
dialog: Brilliant thoughts are often misunderstood by others…

name: Sivney
dialog: … But you're not the general crowd, are you, Trinity?

name: Trinity
dialog: Of course! Everyone can only dream of seeing the world as you do, Dr. Sivney!

title: Trying Too Hard
name: Trinity
dialog: …There! Soul Destruction is fully operational again!

name: Trinity
dialog: With it, I shall bring you victory!

name: Sivney
dialog: The sentiment is appreciated, but isn't Soul Destruction a sniper rifle? Those aren't made for engaging in close-ranged combat. You should stay in the back and cover me.

name: Trinity
dialog: But… my chance to impress Dr. Sivney…

name: Trinity
dialog: Ahem, I mean, I've cleared the first three stages by myself several times before! I know what I'm doing!

name: Sivney
dialog: Well, if you insist…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Nod nod)

name: Sivney
dialog: …Then it shouldn't be too hard for you to aim at different body parts of the monsters so I can observe what their weaknesses are, right?

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps in astonishment)

name: Trinity
dialog: (Gulps) That is a lot harder than taking them out, but I'll try my best!

name: Trinity
dialog: Target locked. Ready, aim, fire!
(Fizzing sounds)

name: Trinity
dialog: No signs of tiring yet. Is this because I am with Dr. Sivney now…?

name: Trinity
dialog: Awesome, Dr. Sivney will surely be impressed by how much I've grown!
(Fizzing sounds)

name: Trinity
dialog: You're right where I want you to be! Take this!
(Fizzing sounds)

name: Trinity
dialog: Great job, me!

name: Trinity
dialog: What is that noise…? Is it a trick of my mind, or is it…

name: Trinity
dialog: Oh, you're trying to attack all at once now?

name: Trinity
dialog: Nice plan, but you are no match for me when I'm fully awake!
(Loud fizzing sounds)

name: Trinity
dialog: Target locked. Full…
(Fizzes and beeps loudly)

name: Trinity
dialog: …Blast…

name: Sivney
dialog: Alright, stop right there!

name: Sivney
dialog: I have no sympathy for brutes like you who try to hurt a sleeping girl in her most vulnerable state…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps angrily)

name: Sivney
dialog: Time to face your punishment!

name: Sivney
dialog: Our Sleeping Beauty slumbers on…

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps worriedly)

name: Sivney
dialog: Let's see...

name: Sivney
dialog: Hm, her Battle Suit and Soul Destruction is still misfunctioning and draining all mana from her.

name: Sivney
dialog: With no other method to replenish mana, sleep may be the best option here.

name: Sivney
dialog: Isn't it, Bonnie?

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps in agreement)

name: Sivney
dialog: I should probably fix her Battle Suit, or it will keep draining her mana.

name: Sivney
dialog: …But where’s the fun in working on something that I'm already finished with?

name: Sivney
dialog: Hmm… Can you do it, Bonnie?

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Puffs out her chest proudly)

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps dejectedly)

name: Sivney
dialog: Seriously? You're saying that you can't fix this because some strange adjustments have been made?

name: Sivney
dialog: I thought you were better than that, Bonnie!

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Chirps indignantly)

name: Sivney
dialog: (Sighs) I suppose I have no choice…
Sivney starts to work on Trinity's Gear.

name: Sivney
dialog: Yikes, what happened to my perfectly designed Suit and Weapon?

name: Sivney
dialog: Every module clashes with each other, and the parts don't fit at all. It's a miracle that they're still functional!

name: Sivney
dialog: Gear that runs despite the errors…

name: Sivney
dialog: There's no way someone without my level of genius can make heads or tails of this mess.

name: Sivney
dialog: Hm? This is the power output module…

name: Trinity
dialog: I…

name: Sivney
dialog: Good morning, Sleeping Beauty.

name: Trinity
dialog: Dr. Sivney! Oh no, did I fall asleep again?

name: Trinity
dialog: I've made a fool of myself…

name: Trinity
dialog: You must be very disappointed in me…

name: Sivney
dialog: Disappointed?

name: Sivney
dialog: Did you adjust your equipment yourself?

name: Trinity
dialog: Yes… I did what I could based on the notes you left me, but my skills are mediocre at best…

name: Sivney
dialog: Despite the time you spent studying under me and the aid my notes gave you, you still managed to butcher my perfect invention.

name: Sivney
dialog: If you're looking for praise, you're certainly barking up the wrong tree.

name: Sivney
dialog: My design's energy conversion efficiency was at least at 80%, and now it barely reaches 30%. That's why you're constantly drowzy.

name: Sivney
dialog: What were you thinking when you tinkered with the power output module?

name: Trinity
dialog: Be-because… My foes were becoming stronger than ever, and I needed more firepower...

name: Trinity
dialog: I wanted to be of help to the Academy, and had an idea on how to improve my gear…

name: Trinity
dialog: After replacing the heat conductor and increasing the beam energy concentration of the rifle, the performance of the rifle in terms of both range and potency were significantly improved.

name: Trinity
dialog: I shouldn't have meddled with your design… I'm so sorry…

name: Sivney
dialog: …Hm, not bad.

name: Trinity
dialog: I…

name: Trinity
dialog: … Wait, what?

name: Sivney
dialog: You did make a mess of the whole contraption, but I am quite satisfied with the changes you made to the power output module.

name: Sivney
dialog: That bout of genius proves that your time spent with me hasn't gone to waste.

name: Trinity
dialog: But… you looked pretty angry…

name: Sivney
dialog: Nah, that was me having fun messing with you.

name: Bonnie
dialog: (Giggles)

name: Sivney
dialog: You do seem to be gifted in this field. If you would like to further your studies, you can borrow my research notes.

name: Sivney
dialog: If I have time to spare, I might also answer some questions of yours.

name: Trinity
dialog: Wow… Am I dreaming?

name: Teresa
dialog: That "Trial" of the Tsuruga Grand Shrine sounds fun… What I wouldn't give for a good fight now!

name: Teresa
dialog: Hmm? What is Mika doing over there, crouched on the ground like that?

name: Teresa
dialog: Hello? Mika?

name: Mika
dialog: Huh? Oh, it's you, Teresa.

name: Teresa
dialog: What are you doing on the ground? Your hands are covered in mud.
Teresa paused briefly as realization struck her.

name: Teresa
dialog: Don't tell me that you're still hung up on what happened in the past.

name: Teresa
dialog: It's been years since that happened! Fixating on your past failures is not healthy for you.

name: Mika
dialog: …No.

name: Mika
dialog: It's not…

name: Mika
dialog: The past is set in stone; thinking about it won't change anything.

name: Teresa
dialog: What are you doing then, if not dwelling on the past?
Mika looked at the clay doll held in her hands. She had just finished molding its shape.

name: Mika
dialog: … Isn't it cute?
She paused again, as if searching for the correct words.

name: Mika
dialog: I am just… passing the time.

name: Teresa
dialog: Hmph… Sure, if you say so.

name: Teresa
dialog: Though, if I had to choose a way to pass the time, I'd choose drinking. Beats getting your hands all dirty.

name: Teresa
dialog: You're not fooling anyone here, Mika.
Mika smiled, not denying nor confirming Teresa's accusations.

name: Mika
dialog: I envy you sometimes.
Mika stood up and brushed dust away from her clothes, still holding the clay doll.

name: Mika
dialog: Despite your status as a nun, you are free and unburdened, going where you please whenever you please.

name: Mika
dialog: It must be nice to have the freedom to just… be yourself.

name: Teresa
dialog: Um, who else should I be, if not myself?

name: Teresa
dialog: Besides, the Church of Violence isn't that strict.
Teresa munched on a Spicy Fishie as another thought struck her.

name: Teresa
dialog: Do you want to try challenging a Trial with me?

name: Mika
dialog: A Trial?

name: Teresa
dialog: Yeah, the ones in the Tsuruga Grand Shrine. It's one of the most popular activities for Yume Academy students now.

name: Mika
dialog: I have heard of it; Senpai mentioned it to me the other day. However, my abilities lean towards the defensive instead of the offensive.

name: Mika
dialog: I fear that I wouldn't be of much use in these Trials where one has to clear one challenge after another for the prize.

name: Teresa
dialog: Oh, I've heard enough.

name: Teresa
dialog: Physically, you've stopped working on that doll of yours, but mentally you're still stuck, aren't you?

name: Teresa
dialog: You need to get up and start moving. Having too much free time on your hands will only pull you into the depths of self-scrutiny, and you'll never find your way out!

name: Mika
dialog: Now that marks the first time I've heard you say anything that remotely represents what a nun might say.

name: Mika
dialog: But…

name: Mika
dialog: Perhaps you are right.

name: Teresa
dialog: Trust me, I know what I'm doing.

name: Teresa
dialog: You can't stop moving forward. Life is like going upstream; you can either allow yourself to be washed away by the pains of the past, or brave them and move on.

name: Teresa
dialog: The best way of stopping your past from getting to you is by overwriting them with new experiences and new memories.

name: Teresa
dialog: That's the secret of my free, unburdened life.

name: Teresa
dialog: Don't go telling everyone else, okay?

name: Teresa
dialog: (Coughs)

name: Mika
dialog: Are you feeling unwell?

name: Teresa
dialog: (Coughs) The air here is foul, just like that young Shrine Maiden said.
Teresa waved her hands around, a futile attempt at dispersing the nauseating smoke that permeated the air.

name: Mika
dialog: I heard that a large portion of visitors to the Shrine aren't here for religious purposes.

name: Mika
dialog: Most have their eyes on the Trial rewards only.

name: Teresa
dialog: …Hmm.

name: Mika
dialog: Penny for your thoughts?

name: Teresa
dialog: Nah, I don't charge for that. I was just surprised that the Shrine Maidens actually tolerated these people in their Shrine.

name: Mika
dialog: …I see.

name: Teresa
dialog: … (Sighs) It's none of my business, anyway.

name: Teresa
dialog: Let's go!

name: Teresa
dialog: Realm of Trials, here I come!

name: Mika
dialog: The enemies here sure look unusual.

name: Teresa
dialog: What do they call them again… Monsters? Shrine Monsters?

name: Mika
dialog: They were supposed to be spawned from negative emotions.

name: Teresa
dialog: Sounds about right.

name: Teresa
dialog: They do look the part, with darkness oozing from every pore.

name: Mika
dialog: If they are truly born from negative emotions, then wouldn't it be better to appease and purify them? We would be doing them a favor for them this way.

name: Teresa
dialog: Are you serious?

name: Teresa
dialog: The only reason I'm taking on the Trials is for a good fight; I wouldn't be here otherwise.

name: Teresa
dialog: There's no need to waste our efforts on "comforting" them when we can just vanquish them!
Teresa brandished her weapon with gusto.

name: Teresa
dialog: Why ruin the fun? I've been looking forward to unleashing carnage on these abominations!
The Nun's eyes gleamed with a wild, primal light as she spoke excitedly.

name: Mika
dialog: (A true nun of the Church of Violence, turning to violence no matter the circumstances.)
A Shrine Monster snuck up on Mika when she was lost in thought and was about to strike her down. Luckily, Teresa blocked the blow before it landed.

name: Teresa
dialog: Oi, keep your head in the game. I brought you here so you can get out of your head, not for you to get stuck deeper in it.

name: Mika
dialog: S-sorry…

name: Teresa
dialog: Get a grip on yourself!

name: Teresa
dialog: You can choose to live in the present and live every moment to the fullest… Or to live in the past and be devoured by your past demons.
Teresa said forcefully as she slashed and hacked at the waves of Monsters rushing at them.

name: Teresa
dialog: Personally, I would prefer the former instead of the latter!
Every hit of Teresa's struck true, and the Monster wailed before shattering into pieces.
The remains of the Monsters were dark as ink and left black stains on the walls and floorboards of the Shrine.

name: Mika
dialog: (Is this why you believe in violence so much…?)

name: Teresa
dialog: Phew…

name: Teresa
dialog: Good work, partner!
Teresa grinned widely and patted Mika's shoulder.

name: Mika
dialog: If it wasn't for you, that last wave of Monsters would have…

name: Teresa
dialog: Don't worry about it!

name: Teresa
dialog: We deserve a break after all that fighting. I would kill for a nice keg of beer now…
Teresa sat cross-legged on the floor, looking comfortable.

name: Teresa
dialog: What's on your mind? You look troubled again.
Mika stood tensely in front of Teresa, worried about what she was about to say.

name: Mika
dialog: But… Swinging your sword around and exhausting yourself with excitement... Isn't that the same as avoiding the problem?

name: Teresa
dialog: What?

name: Mika
dialog: Can one truly move on from their past demons while living like this?

name: Mika
dialog: If we do not address the problems, if excitement is all we live for…
The former Swordmaster gazed intently at her teammate, frowning.

name: Mika
dialog: … Aren't we just averting our eyes from them?

name: Mika
dialog: Our past is a part of us, and no matter how far we go… It will eventually catch up with us.
Teresa's eyes widened in astonishment. What Mika said contradicted what she believed for the main part of her life.

name: Teresa
dialog: Averting our eyes, you say?
This was the first time her core beliefs have been described that way.

name: Teresa
dialog: …Running away?
A long, long time has passed since Teresa started to live her life like the protagonist of a movie.
She crammed one exhilarating event after another into her life to escape from her past demons,
but they always catch up when she stops for a break.
The only thing she could do was to lengthen the time in between breaks to the best of her abilities, which exhausted her.

name: Teresa
dialog: …What other choice do I have?
Teresa snorted.

name: Teresa
dialog: Should I take a page from your book and hold onto a clay doll like a lifeline? Has it made you feel any better?

name: Mika
dialog: I don't know what happened to you, Teresa, but…

name: Teresa
dialog: Behind you!
Teresa pulled Mika away from the dark shadow and slashed it into pieces.

name: Teresa
dialog: Break time is over!

name: Teresa
dialog: Hah, is this all the Tsuruga Grand Shrine's ominous "Trials" have to offer?

name: Teresa
dialog: Pathetic.

name: Shrine Monster
dialog: Te…re…

name: Mika
dialog: Are they… speaking to you?

name: Teresa
dialog: Ugh, you're making my head hurt.

name: Mika
dialog: Teresa? Are they saying your name?

name: Teresa
dialog: Shut up. Shut up!!
Frustrated by their wails, Teresa flew into a rage and her slashes became more forceful.

title: Demons from the Past
name: Teresa
dialog: Phew…

title: To Heart's Content
name: Teresa
dialog: (Coughs)

title: Secret to Living Freely
name: Teresa
dialog: That "Trial" of the Tsuruga Grand Shrine sounds fun… What I wouldn't give for a good fight now!
